testcase.classname: User able to see detailed information of specific vehicle
testcase.name: User can see the "General Information" page by clicking on any vehicle (row), under 'Fleet-Vehicle' module
testcase.system-out: Given User on the Fleet-Vehicle page........................................passed When User clicks any vehicle (row)..........................................passed Then User can see the General Information page..............................passed

testcase.classname: User able to see detailed information of specific vehicle
testcase.name: User can see the "General Information" page clicking on the "Eye (View)" icon at the end of each row, under 'Fleet-Vehicle' module
testcase.system-out: Given User on the Fleet-Vehicle page........................................passed When User clicks on the Eye (View) icon at the end of each row..............passed Then User can see the General Information page..............................passed

testcase.classname: User able to see detailed information of specific vehicle

testcase.system-out: Given Sales manager on the Fleet-Vehicle page...............................passed When Sales manager clicks a row for go to General Information page..........passed Then Sales manager can see "Edit", "Delete" and "Add Event" buttons on the General Information page.passed
